Text: Thanks for the upload, I know it's new but there aren't many people seeding after they download.  Download speed for me is only around 100kB/s.  Will seed for as long as I can after it's done until I have to start downloading BF3.

@mrfoofer

Actually, it's so the torrent is downloaded faster. Instead of 10,000 people trying to get one file, it's split into many files to free some of the load. Damn people shouldn't post comments unless they know what they're talking about.
